    • systemUpdate

      private boolean systemUpdate​(Router r, char operation)
      Overloaded function to update all tracked records. Edit the router's records.
      Parameters:
      r - Router object
      operation - [Operation '+': to add, Operation '-': to delete]
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if the system is updated successfully
